task.title: Jacking the car
task.shortdesc: Jack or raise the car with the special tool provided.

context.p: The jack supplied with the vehicle is designed to lift one side of the vehicle at a time.

step.cmd: Remove the rubber plug from the socket below the door on the exterior of the car.
Insert the arm of the jack into the socket.
step.stepresult: The jack should lean slightly outwards at the top to allow for the radial movement of the vehicle as it is raised.

messagepanel.typeofhazard: Avoid distorting the bracket and damaging the jack.
messagepanel.howtoavoid: Ensure the bar is fully inserted into the jacking bracket before attempting to lift the car.

step.cmd: Hold the jack bar up into the jacking bracket with one hand and turn the jack screw with your other hand until the car begins to lift.
